title: Meditation Aromatherapy Room Mist
author: Beau Nordby
description: Now in 4oz amber bottles! Breathe easy and open your mind with this powerful blend of peru balsam, lavender, and sandalwood. Transform your space and enhance your mood with the true scents of nature! Our environmentally responsible room mists are created for home and office using only 100% pure essential oil aromatherapy blends in purified water.
